item.title: Travel - The ancient leather tanners of Ecuador - BBC News
item.description:
Travel - The ancient leather tanners of Ecuador  BBC News

In the town of Cotacachi, Ecuador, which bustles with more than 50 leather artisans and shops, one family still holds on to a centuries-old tanning recipe.

item.title: Julian Assange: Wikileaks founder rejects deal allowing him to leave Ecuador embassy in London after six years - The Independent
